RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.8 svn-revision#13980.--> <definitions targetNamespace="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/" name="HelloWorldService" xmlns:wsu="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-utility-1.0.xsd" xmlns:wsp="http://www.w3.org/ns/ws-policy" xmlns:wsp1_2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/09/policy" xmlns:wsam="http://www.w3.org/2007/05/addressing/metadata" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8088/WsTomcatSample1/hello?xsd=1"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="sayHello"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:sayHello"/> </message> <message name="sayHelloResponse"> <part name="parameters" element="tns:sayHelloResponse"/> </message> <portType name="HelloWorld"> <operation name="sayHello"> <input wsam:Action="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/HelloWorld/sayHelloRequest" message="tns:sayHello"/> <output wsam:Action="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/HelloWorld/sayHelloResponse" message="tns:sayHelloResponse"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="HelloWorldPortBinding" type="tns:HelloWorld"> <soap:binding transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" style="document"/> <operation name="sayHello"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="HelloWorldService"> <port name="HelloWorldPort" binding="tns:HelloWorldPortBinding"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8088/WsTomcatSample1/hello"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.8 svn-revision#13980.--> <xs:schema version="1.0" targetNamespace="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/" xmlns:tns="http://helloworld.test.djs.com/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="sayHello" type="tns:sayHello"/> <xs:element name="sayHelloResponse" type="tns:sayHelloResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="sayHello"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="arg0" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="sayHelloResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="return" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>
